sub_title: Operations management | Project management | Contract management | Logistics and Freight management |  People Manager | Process improvement | Safety | Leadership
summary: Dutch-based with wide-ranging International exposure, experienced both Onsite and as a Head office based Manager. I have a clear, logical mind with a practical and creative approach to problem-solving and decision making, close attention to detail, planning, and a drive to see things through to on-time completion. I have more than ten years of international experience of which five years was in managing, motivating and leading multicultural teams. I am eager to learn, I enjoy overcoming challenges, and I have a genuine interest in Business and process improvement management and making organizations more efficient, successful, profitable, while enhancing its reputation with both its customers, and suppliers. I am great at working with others to achieve its objectives on time and with excellence. Furthermore, I possess strong budgeting, financial and variation control ability, with core value commitments to safety, integrity and business compliance and a high level of contract management awareness.

profile_positions.description: Lead and manage the development and global roll out of Life-saving rules (LSR) for the Mammoet organisation. LSR are designed to give clear, specific requirements which will ensure consistency across our operations in the management of critical risks. These rules are mandatory and non-negotiable and are a key part of our strategy to learn from past accidents and prevent repeat incidents. The goal is to further improve the safety culture and safety performance and to move Mammoet to an even higher level. The ultimate ambition is to be leading in safety culture.
profile_positions.title: Program manager Life-Saving rules

profile_positions.description: After returning to the Company’s Global Head office in the Netherlands I was assigned to develop and roll out a new internal program named “Fundamentals”. These fundamental principles will guide our employees on how we put our values into practice as we work together, with safety and well-being at the heart of everything we do. From collaboration to individual development and company success.
profile_positions.title: Initiative lead for Mammoet Fundamentals campaign

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the coordination, implementation, and integration of two global businesses being Mammoet and ALE into one new “smarter, safer, stronger” organisation within the Middle East and Africa region. 
- Manage the complete transition process in close cooperation with Global IMO team.
- Act as a facilitator, communicator, project manager, coach and bridge builder
- Drive change management by process improvement across several core work streams to incorporate “best of both worlds “practices.
- Gained vast knowledge of the business as a whole by being able to work multi-disciplinary and         throughout all layers of the organisation.
profile_positions.title: Integration Manager Middle East and Africa Region

profile_positions.description:
For Middle East and Africa to lead, structure, and standardize the project management departments (9FTE) and to ensure internal effectiveness and synergy between operations and sales.
Resource the department to improve project management skills and capacity building of current personnel with a strong focus on:
- Contract risk management
- Project preparation
- Execution and project controlling
- Monitoring costs and Financial trends
profile_positions.title: Manager Projects Middle East and Africa Region

profile_positions.description:
Core responsibilities were to set up, build, structure, and standardize a project management department (4 FTE) and ensuring internal effectiveness and synergy between operations and sales.
Resource the department to improve project management skills and capacity building of current personnel with a strong focus on:
- Contract risk management
- Project preparation
- Execution and project controlling
- Monitoring costs and Financial trends
profile_positions.title: Manager Projects Southern Africa

profile_positions.description: End-to-End Logistical Project Management (Initiating, Planning, Executing, Monitoring & Controlling & Closing) for 3rd party customers and Mammoet own equipment worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Logistics

profile_positions.description:
Amsterdam Container Terminals (ACT; formerly known as Ceres Paragon Terminal) and Amsterdam Marine Terminals (AMT; formerly known as Ceres Amsterdam Marine Terminal) are wholly owned subsidiaries of Amsterdam Port Holdings. ACT is a member of the Hutchison Port Holdings (HPH) Group. 

Core responsibilities:
- Responsible for all terminal affairs and day to day business
- Developing and implementation of effective and cost saving working routines for operational personnel. 
- Developing and implementiation all terminals work and safety procedures.
- Developing and implementation of a management information reporting system.
- Quality control (operational and reporting)
- Maintain relationships with existing customers.
- Developing, implementation and execution of total education program for all operational jobs and administration flows. 
- Vice PFSO (Port Facility Security Officer)
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Ceres Terminals Europe consists of two terminals, 
The Ceres Amsterdam Marine terminal and the Ceres Paragon Terminal
profile_positions.title: Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Support the CEU Area Intermodal strategy by executing the guidelines laid  down in the Intermodal Strategy and Inland Terminal Concept.
Responsible for the planning and execution of equipment activities within the Intermodal & Equipment team in Rotterdam.
Ensure sufficient equipment is positioned and stock is available in the Netherlands to handle the forecasted volumes, and contribute to equipment management flows within the Netherlands to meet the required demands at the most cost effective way.
profile_positions.title: Equipment Coordinator
Writing final thesis Dynamic slot capacity management
